table.name: IAMAppAccount
table.description: Root entity within a Zoho App, for an Account. All data, belong to a user or a group of users is stored under this AppAccount. An Account can have any number of AppAccounts each uniquely identified by it's own screen name

column.name: APP_NAME
column.description: Unique identifier of this APP.

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of this APPAccount.

column.name: SCREEN_NAME
column.description: Unique identifier of this APP Account.

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The creator of this account

column.name: ZAAID
column.description: Zoho App Account ID. The data space in which the App stores the data in its grid. The ZAAID versus actual dburl will be present in SASAccounts/CustomerDatabase tables. It is also used to exnternalize the DB cluster, Appservers and other components to independent Data-center of Customer/Partner. The SAS OS and App GRID provisioning will be done by downloading builds from Zoho.com

column.name: RESOURCE_HIERARCHY_ID
column.description: The Hierarchy to be used to get the ACP/ACEs for all resources within this App Account

column.name: ROLE_HIERARCHY_ID
column.description: The AppAccountGroup Hierarchy which represents the Role tree for all roles within this App Account

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description about this account. Used for display purpose

column.name: ACCOUNT_STATUS
column.description: Current status of the account Active - 1, Inactive - 0, Closed - 2

column.name: DIRECTORY_ZAAID
column.description: ZAAID of Directory Account.

column.name: IS_EXPOSED
column.description: 1 - External, 2 - Internal

column.name: ENVIRONMENT
column.description: 1 - Production, 2 - Sandbox, 3- Development

column.name: SERVICE_TYPE
column.description: Type of the Service created ORG. Equivalent to Sorgtype. The type is differentiated per service

column.name: PARENT_ORG_TYPE
column.description: Type of the SOID / AppAccount. Value `16` represents AppAccount or org type of respective SOID services.

table.name: IAMAppAccountService
table.description: This will conatin Zoho App for which the members are belongs.

column.name: APP_NAME
column.description: Unique identifier of this APP.

column.name: SUB_SERVICE_TYPE
column.description: Type of the Service created ORG. Equivalent to Sorgtype. The type is differentiated per service

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The creator of this account

column.name: RESOURCE_HIERARCHY_ID
column.description: The Hierarchy to be used to get the ACP/ACEs for all resources within this App Account

column.name: ROLE_HIERARCHY_ID
column.description: The AppAccountGroup Hierarchy which represents the Role tree for all roles within this App Account

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description about this account. Used for display purpose

column.name: ACCOUNT_STATUS
column.description: Current status of the account Active - 1, Inactive - 0, Closed - 2

column.name: DIRECTORY_ZAAID
column.description: ZAAID of Directory Account.

column.name: IS_EXPOSED
column.description: 1 - External, 2 - Internal

column.name: ENVIRONMENT
column.description: 1 - Production, 2 - Sandbox, 3- Development

column.name: PARENT_ORG_TYPE
column.description: Type of the SOID / AppAccount. Value `16` represents AppAccount or org type of respective SOID services.

table.name: IAMAccountOAuthAccessGrant
table.description: Appaccount member granting access to third party apps to use an OrgOAuthToken on behalf of him/her appaccount

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this access grant.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or device the access has been made.

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the grant is given

table.name: IAMAccountOAuthAccessGrantScopes
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular appaccount.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMAccountMember
table.description: User versus AppAccount association. A user has to be a AppAccountMember in this to access a Zoho App

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: User , Group , Account

column.name: ZARID
column.description: Assigns the Role for the given user from IAMAppRole.ZARID

column.name: USER_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Normal, 2 - Free User

table.name: IAMAccountMemberRole
table.description: Role for accessing custom acl check

column.name: ZARID
column.description: Assigns the Role for the given user from IAMAppRole.ZARID

table.name: IAMAppAccountConfiguration
table.description: User versus AppAccount association. A user has to be a AppAccountMember in this to access a Zoho App

column.name: CONFIG_NAME
column.description: Name of the configuration in dot notation format. For example, {feature}.{parameter}

column.name: CONFIG_VALUE
column.description: Value of the configuration. The value can be set during deployment and can be changed in run time from Zoho Accounts Admin Console

table.name: IAMAppAccountMember
table.description: User versus AppAccount association. A user has to be a AppAccountMemberin this to access a Zoho App

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: User , Group , Account

column.name: ZARID
column.description: Assigns the Role for the given user from IAMAppRole.ZARID

table.name: IAMAppAccountRebrand
table.description: Users can customize the App (UI, Email/SMS communication, etc.,) based on their business need. All rebrandable attributes of an App is defined in "AppRebrand"

column.name: REBRAND_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
column.description: Defined in AppRebrand entity. Identifies a rebrand attribute, for example, share email template, of the App

column.name: REBRAND_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: Value of the rebrand attribute selected by the account admin

table.name: IAMAppAccountServiceLicense
table.description: Values of the attributes that control the usage of a Zoho App based on the choosen licensing plan

column.name: LICENSE_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
column.description: Generated in the System space. Identifies a license attribute, for example, number of users / amount of data space, of the App

column.name: LICENSE_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: The value of the license attribute selected by account admin

table.name: IAMAppAccountLicense
table.description: Values of the attributes that control the usage of a Zoho App based on the choosen licensing plan

column.name: LICENSE_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
column.description: Generated in the System space. Identifies a license attribute, for example, number of users / amount of data space, of the App

column.name: LICENSE_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: The value of the license attribute selected by account admin

table.name: IAMAppAccountUserAttribute
table.description: App specific user attributes. User can have different attribute value for different Apps. For example, nick name, photo

column.name: USER_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
column.description: Identifies a user attribute, for example, display name, specific to a App

column.name: USER_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: Value of the user attribute

table.name: IAMAppAccountAttribute
table.description: App specific user attributes, that are required for functioning of the App, to be collected from the user at the time of registration. For example, nick name, photo

column.name: ATTRIBUTE_KEY
column.description: Identifies a app account attribute

column.name: ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: Value of the attribute

table.name: IAMAppAccountTemplate
table.description: Contains HTML of the Sign In, Sign Up pages, Invitation, etc

column.name: FROM_ADDRESS
column.description: Will be used for Mail templates.

column.name: REPLY_TO_ADDRESS
column.description: Will be used for Mail templates.

table.name: IAMAppAccountTemplateImage
table.description: contains images of the templates

column.name: TRANSMAIL_STATUS
column.description: Current status of the transmail Active - 1, Inactive - 0

column.name: LANGUAGE_CODE
column.description: Language code contains lower case of two letter code defined as following format language_country_localevariant

table.name: IAMAppAccountI18n
table.description: Localization of UI components of a Zoho App.

column.name: I18N_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
column.description: Internationalized Attribute Name as per the I18n Guidelines http://i18n/

column.name: IS_FILE
column.description: If the i18n attribute is of type file, then the value will FILE_ID issued by ZFS.

column.name: I18N_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: The localized value of the I18N key

table.name: IAMAppAccountRebrandL10n
table.description: For rebrandable attributes that can be localized are defined here.

column.name: REBRAND_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
column.description: Defined in AppRebrand entity. Identifies a rebrand attribute, for example, share email template, of the App

table.name: IAMAppAccountAddress
table.description: The address of the AppAccount.

column.name: ADDRESS_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Work (2^0), 2 - Residential current(2^1), 4 - Residential permanent(2^2)

table.name: IAMAppAccountPolicy
table.description: This will conatin policy of the Appaccount

column.name: POLICY_KEY
column.description: Unique identifier of this APP.

column.name: POLICY_VALUE
column.description: The creator of this account

column.name: WEEK_STARTS_ON
column.description: 1 = Sunday, 2 = Monday, 3 = Tuesday, 4 = Wednesday, 5 = Thrusday, 6 = Friday, 7 = Saturday

column.name: NAME_FORMAT
column.description: 1 = (First_Name Last_Name), 2 = (Last_Name, First_Name), 3 = First_Name, 4 = Last_Name

column.name: SHORT_DATE_FORMAT
column.description: MM.dd.yy, dd-MM-yy, yy/MM/dd, etc. Supported Separater [ . - / ]

column.name: MEDIUM_DATE_FORMAT
column.description: MM.dd.yyyy, dd-MM-yyyy, yyyy/MM/dd, etc. Supported Separater [ . - / ]

column.name: LONG_DATE_FORMAT
column.description: dd MMM yyyy, (EEE, MMMM dd, yyyy), ()MMM dd, yyyy) etc. No Separater.

column.name: FISCAL_YEAR_START_MONTH
column.description: Month index from January (1) to December (12)

column.name: TAX_BASIS
column.description: Tax payment done on Accrual basis(false) or Cash basis(true)

column.name: CURRENCY_CODE
column.description: INR, USD, EUR, etc

column.name: CURRENCY_SYMBOL
column.description: Rs., $, EUR, etc

table.name: IAMCPortalAdmin
table.description: The zuid of the users with roles

column.name: ZUID
column.description: Unique ID of the user across Zoho

column.name: ROLE
column.description: The corressponding role of the user

table.name: IAMSAMLSpApp
table.description: Used to store other third party apps, that are using zoho as saml ID provider

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description about this App. Used for display purpose

column.name: ACS_URL
column.description: Saml Acs url of the app.

column.name: IDENTIFIER
column.description: Identify the app.

column.name: APP_ID
column.description: Random ID to identify app.

column.name: NAME_ID_FIELD
column.description: Used to store whcih field should be returned in NameId. 1 - Email

column.name: NAME_ID
column.description: Used to store NameId attribute which is send in SAML Response

column.name: SIGN_IN_URL
column.description: Url to initiate the signin request.

column.name: DEFAULT_RELAY_STATE
column.description: Url to provide default relay state.

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public key to share to user.

column.name: PRIVATE_KEY
column.description: Private key to sign.

column.name: IDP_MODE_SUPPORTED
column.description: used to specify wheather IDP mode is supported or not. If not SIGN_IN_URL is mandatory for IDP initiate.

column.name: LOGOUT_URL
column.description: logout URL of service.

column.name: IDP_ISSUER
column.description: Zoho Issuer Details.

column.name: APP_TYPE
column.description: App Type : OIDC /SAML.

table.name: IAMOIDCApp
table.description: Used to store other third party apps, that are using zoho as Open ID provider

column.name: CLIENT_ZID
column.description: OAuth Client zid associated with OIDC case

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: This is the primary app for this Custom app. This client cannot be deleted. All user-oidc claims will be maintained under this client

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: App is Enabled or disabled --> same will be reflected in oauthclient side as well

table.name: IAMSAMLSpAppInfo
table.description: Used to store other third party apps, that are using zoho as saml ID provider

column.name: IDP_ISSUER
column.description: Zoho (IdP) issuer, which will be send in SAMLResponse

column.name: IDP_PRIVATE_KEY
column.description: The Private Key, which is used to sign the SAMLResponse

column.name: IDP_PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: The Public Key, which is used by SP to verify the signed the SAMLResonse

column.name: ACS_URL
column.description: The URL to which the SAMLResponse will be sent

column.name: DEFAULT_RELAY_STATE
column.description: The URL to which SP redirects, after SAMLVerification

column.name: IDP_INITIATED
column.description: To specify whether the service provder allows IdP-initated login

column.name: SIGN_IN_URL
column.description: The URL to which the request will be redirected, if IdP-initated login was not allowed

column.name: LOGOUT_URL
column.description: logout URL of service.

column.name: SP_ISSUER
column.description: The service provider Issuer, which will be send in SAMLResponse

column.name: NAMEID_FORMAT
column.description: The NameId attribute, which will be sent in SAML Response 0 - Unspecified 1 - Email address 2 - X.509 subject name

column.name: NAMEID_VALUE
column.description: The value to be assigned with NameId attribute Email, UserName, Regex Expression

column.name: SAML_RESPONSE_FORMAT
column.description: The format on which the SAML Response will be sent to SP. 1 - Unsigned SAML Response with a signed Assertion 2 - Signed SAML Response with an unsigned Assertion 3 - Signed SAML Response with a signed Assertion 4 - Unsigned SAML Response with an encrypted Assertion 5 - Unsigned SAML Response with an encrypted signed Assertion 6 - Signed SAML Response with an encrypted Assertion 7 - Signed SAML Response with an encrypted signed Assertion

table.name: IAMSAMLSpAppAttribute
table.description: Used to store other third party apps, that are using zoho as saml ID provider

column.name: ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: Used to store whcih field should be returned in Attribute. 1 - Email, 2 - Firstname, 3 - LastName, 4 - FullName, 5 - UserName

table.name: IAMSAMLSpUser
table.description: permit SAML flow if the user is an SAML user

column.name: ZID
column.description: Unique ID of the saml user across Zoho

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1 - User, 2 - Group

table.name: IAMClientPortalOrgType
table.description: OrgTypes under a client portal

column.name: ORG_TYPE
column.description: Orgtype of the service added in client portal

table.name: IAMPortalMapping
table.description: Mapping of ServiceOrgDomain, ServiceOrgZAID in client portal

table.name: IAMPortalAccountMapping
table.description: Mapping of ServiceOrgDomain, ServiceOrgZAID in client portal

column.name: ACCOUNT_ID
column.description: Unique Identifier

column.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE
column.description: Constants defined by Service to identify the Account.

column.name: ACCOUNT_NAME
column.description: Uniuqe Account Name such as Facebook App Id, Twitter Profile ID, etc.

table.name: IAMAccountScheduleDetails
table.description: Maintains the scheduling info related to account

column.name: SCHEDULER_TYPE
column.description: Type of the scheduler

column.name: STATUS
column.description: The status of the scheduling job; Inited -0,processed-1 or error-2

table.name: IAMAppAccountDevices
table.description: This will contain all the meeting room data for an org.

column.name: DEVICE_ID
column.description: Unique device id. This will be passed in thread local

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display name of device. Will be shown in UI to user. Can be used as reference while clearing the sessions

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Device is available or not
